info.name: DnD Beyond Dark Character Sheets
info.description: Makes the character sheets for DnD Beyond in a dark style.
info.additionalInfo:
Edit: Added more styling for the responsive layouts.
Edit2: Fixed the item description pane in the manage equipment sidebar
Edit3: Refined the URL Regex to prevent modifying the character editor, some more sidebar fixes
Edit4: Uh.. its been a while, I've updated a lot!
